survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Subscription-Based Meal Kit Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and satisfaction levels with subscription-based meal kit services to help providers improve their offerings.

questions.question_text: How often do you use subscription-based meal kit services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use subscription-based meal kit services?

questions.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to subscribe to a meal kit service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.

script.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to subscribe to a meal kit service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of ingredients provided in your meal kits?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected any frequency other than 'This is my first time' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction levels. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.
